member.summary: Converts an item to a Set

member.summary: Converts an array of items to a Set

member.summary: Converts an array of items to a Set

member.summary: Converts a Collection of items to a Set

member.summary: Converts an ArrayList of items to a Set

member.name: M:PIEBALD.Types.Set`1.op_Addition(PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0},PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0})
member.summary: Union of the two Sets; Set of items that are elements of at least one of the Sets.

member.name: M:PIEBALD.Types.Set`1.op_Subtraction(PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0},PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0})
member.summary: Relative complement; items that are elements of the first Set, but not Elements of the second Set.

member.name: M:PIEBALD.Types.Set`1.op_BitwiseOr(PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0},PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0})
member.summary: Union of the two Sets; items that are elements of at least one of the Sets.

member.name: M:PIEBALD.Types.Set`1.op_BitwiseAnd(PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0},PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0})
member.summary: Intersection of the two Sets; items that are elements of both of the Sets.

member.name: M:PIEBALD.Types.Set`1.op_ExclusiveOr(PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0},PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0})
member.summary: Exclusive Or of the two Sets; items that are elements of only one of the Sets.

member.name: M:PIEBALD.Types.Set`1.op_Equality(PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0},PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0})
member.summary: Test equality of Sets; True if both Sets have the same elements

member.name: M:PIEBALD.Types.Set`1.op_Inequality(PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0},PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0})
member.summary: Test inequality of Sets; True if the Sets do not have the same elements

member.name: M:PIEBALD.Types.Set`1.op_LessThan(PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0},PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0})
member.summary: Subset; true if the first Set is a subset of (but is not equal to) the second

member.name: M:PIEBALD.Types.Set`1.op_GreaterThan(PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0},PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0})
member.summary: Superset; true if the first Set is a superset of (but is not equal to) the second

member.name: M:PIEBALD.Types.Set`1.op_LessThanOrEqual(PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0},PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0})
member.summary: Subset; true if the first Set is a subset of the second

member.name: M:PIEBALD.Types.Set`1.op_GreaterThanOrEqual(PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0},PIEBALD.Types.Set{`0})
member.summary: Superset; true if the first Set is a superset of the second

member.summary: Enumerator for the elements of the Set

member.summary: Yada yada yada

member.summary: Yada yada yada

member.name: M:PIEBALD.Types.Set`1.ToString
member.summary: Returns the elements of the Set in set format; { element1 , element2 ... }
member.remarks: ToString() is called on each element in turn. No attempt is made to protect against elements whose ToString() values contain commas or braces.

member.name: M:PIEBALD.Types.Set`1.ToString(PIEBALD.Types.SortMode,System.Object[])
member.summary: Returns the elements of the Set in set format; { element1 , element2 ... }
member.param: Whether or not to sort the elements.
(Optional) Formatting information to pass to ToString()
member.remarks: ToString() is called on each element in turn. No attempt is made to protect against elements whose ToString() values contain commas or braces.
